tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I was suffering from GERD from 10 months and couldn't get any relief after 10 doctor consultation, 50 tests, 100 medicines  from 10 different hospitals. But with 1 endoscopy test, Dr. Praneeth had identified the issue and resolved the problem. He took ample time to explain the identified issue and told me the procedure to get permanent relief from Acid Reflux. He checked all the previous medical test  reports and did 1 test only to clarify the doubt. I believe AIIM S doctor are very much capable of identifying the exact cause/disease. Thank you Dr. Praneeth üëç

***** ***** ******** ****** ********** *** ******* **** *** ******* *** *** ******* ** ********* *** ********** ********* *** ***** ********* **** *** ** ***** 

My father is admitted in hospital for one issue ***** *** ** ********* ** ** ***** *** made my father admitted for 4 days. Still they keep on doing different tests for which they can claim amount from Insurance companies. 

******* ** ****** ** **** ****** **** **** ****** *** *** **** ** **** *** ***** 

They wil speak nice and make us feel that they are very good in explaining and caring. ********** ** ****** ** ****** Just understand this.

By the way my father treatment is still going on and may be another 3-5 days admission wil be required, waiting to hear the same from doctor.

Dr. Praneeth has listen to me very carefully about my problem and asked few questions and suggested endoscopy for further examination.

From the endoscopy, got to know I have infected with H pylori and the medicine prescribed by the doctor helped in recovering after having course for 2 weeks as suggested by the doctor.

Dr. Praneeth gives very good explanation about the issue, he practically explains what precautions we need to take care to get rid of the problem , he also well explained whether the problem can be cured with the treatment or do the problem persists lifetime.  We visited the doctor for Hepatitis B, I feel value for our money.

Dr Moka Praneeth gives good explanation of the disease process, relevant investigation and appropriate treatment.

Very soft spoken doctor and maintains  good communication  and follow up with his patients
reply_text: Thanks for taking time to write this review.
